SELECT B.ID, B.USERNAME, B.NICKNAME, A.IS_ADMIN, C.`NAME` AS DEPT_NAME, D.`NAME` AS POST_NAME
ORDER BY B.ID LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
SELECT A.ID,A.`NAME` FROM `TENANT` A INNER JOIN USER_TENANT B ON A.ID = B.TENANT_ID WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.IS_DELETED = FALSE ORDER BY A.ID
SELECT B.`STATUS`,A.IS_ADMIN FROM USER_TENANT A INNER JOIN TENANT B ON A.TENANT_ID = B.ID WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.IS_DELETED = FALSE
